fields.name: The Flake
fields.luck_special: When you spend a point of Luck, pick an aspect of the current situation. The Keeper will tell you what other conspiracies that aspect connects to.
fields.description: A conspiracy theorist. The Flake is great at finding things out and seeing how the events of separate mysteries are connected. E.g. Agent Mulder or The Lone Gunman from the X-Files.

fields.name: The Mundane
fields.luck_special: When you spend a point of Luck, you’ll find something weird— maybe even useful!
fields.description: Just a normal regular person, especially good at dealing with regular people you meet and have to save, and at getting captured by monsters - which can be more useful than you might think. E.g. Xander or Cordelia from Buffy the Vampire Slayer, Olivia Dunham from Fringe.

fields.name: The Chosen
fields.luck_special: When you spend a point of Luck, the Keeper will bring your fate into play.
fields.description: A once-ordinary person who discovered they have a special destiny, and who has been given the power to accomplish it. The Chosen is good in a fight, with some weird powers. E.g. Buffy from Buffy the Vampire Slayer.

fields.name: The Crooked
fields.luck_special: Whenever you spend a Luck point, someone from your past will re-appear in your life. Soon.
fields.description: A criminal turned monster hunter, haunted by their past and enemies. The Crooked is good in social situations and has a lot of contacts. E.g. Anna Valmont from The Dresden Files, Peter Bishop from Fringe.

fields.name: The Divine
fields.luck_special: When you spend a point of Luck, you get word your Mission requires something difficult that must be done. By you. Urgently.
fields.description: An agent of a higher power, with a mission to fulfill. The Divine is very tough and has been granted holy powers. E.g. Castiel from Supernatural; Michael Carpenter from The Dresden Files.

fields.name: The Expert
fields.luck_special: When you spend a point of Luck, you discover something happening now is related to something you were involved in years ago.
fields.description: The hunter who knows all about monsters and magic. The Expert knows a lot of hidden secrets and how to find out more, and also has a well-supplied base to work from. E.g. Bobby Singer from Supernatural; Rupert Giles from Buffy the Vampire Slayer.

fields.name: The Initiate
fields.luck_special: When you spend a point of Luck, something goes wrong for your Sect: an ill-advised project or a disastrous operation.
fields.description: A member of an ancient monster-slaying Sect, trained to fight and use magic. The Initiate is good with magic, and their Sect provides help (and sometimes problems). E.g. The Wardens from The Dresden Files; Annelise from the Twenty Palaces series.

fields.name: The Monstrous
fields.luck_special: When you spend a point of Luck, your monster side gains power: your Curse may become stronger, or another Breed disadvantage may manifest.
fields.description: A monster fighting for the good guys. The Monstrous is very weird, and can have a variety of different powers based on what monster breed they are. E.g. Angel from Buffy the Vampire Slayer and Angel; Bill Compton from True Blood.

fields.name: The Professional
fields.luck_special: When you spend a point of Luck, your next mission from the Agency comes with lots of Red Tape. Lots.
fields.description: You work for an agency that hunts monsters. The Professional is good in a fight, and a good team player. E.g. Riley and the Initiative from Buffy the Vampire Slayer; Olivia Dunham from Fringe.

fields.name: The Spell-Slinger
fields.luck_special: When you spend a point of Luck, the official council of wizards is going to poke their nose into your business.
fields.description: A trained wizard, wielding powerful magic in their crusade against evil. The Spell-slinger’s arcane training gives them an advantage when dealing with eldritch secrets. E.g. Harry Dresden from The Dresden Files; Willow from Buffy the Vampire Slayer, in the later seasons.

fields.name: The Spooky
fields.luck_special: As you mark off Luck boxes, your dark side’s needs will get nastier.
fields.description: Has psychic or magical powers. These powers are strange and sinister ... and not completely under the Spooky’s control. E.g. Sam Winchester from Supernatural; Eleven from Stranger Things.

fields.name: The Wronged
fields.luck_special: When you spend a point of Luck, you find a dangerous lead on your prey.
fields.description: Revenge-driven, and really tough. The Wronged is all about killing a specific breed of monster and protecting others as you do it. E.g. Dean and John Winchester from Supernatural.
